nodes.title: VideoTranslatorAI at the 2024 NSW Commercialisation Showcase
nodes.description: Join VideoTranslatorAI as we showcase cutting-edge tech at the 2024 NSW Commercialisation Showcase, celebrating innovation and collaboration in NSW!
nodes.coverAlt: VideoTranslatorAI at the 2024 NSW Commercialisation Showcase

nodes.title: VideoTranslatorAI Wins Feasibility Study for NSW Small Business Innovation & Research Program
nodes.description: VideoTranslatorAI wins NSW SBIR 2022 feasibility study, focusing on AI for healthcare in CALD communities. We are excited to contribute to a more inclusive healthcare in NSW.
nodes.coverAlt: VideoTranslatorAI Wins Feasibility Study for NSW Small Business Innovation & Research Program

nodes.title: Embracing Resilience: Our Journey with the Bushfire Commercialisation Fund
nodes.description: Our journey with the Bushfire Commercialisation Fund, the power of positive feedback, and our next steps. #bushfiremitigation #resilience
nodes.coverAlt: Embracing Resilience: Our Journey With the Forest Fire Commercialization Fund

nodes.title: We Are Participating in NSW Small Business Month 2022
nodes.description: NSW Small Business Month is running this November and VideoTranslatorAi is part of it!
nodes.coverAlt: Connect for success with NSW Small Business Month

nodes.title: We Are Now A Microsoft Partner!
nodes.description: VideoTranslator is now a Microsoft partner under the Microsoft Cloud Partner Program!
nodes.coverAlt: We Are Now A Microsoft Partner

nodes.title: How To Use An AI Assurance Framework
nodes.description: What is an AI assurance framework and how to apply it to your projects.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Use An AI Assurance Framework

nodes.title: What Enterprises Need To Know About Video Transcription?
nodes.description: What are the big need to know's around video transcription, why, how and when. Read more...
nodes.coverAlt: What Enterprises Need To Know About Video Transcription?

nodes.title: Reviewing Vixer Video Editor On iPhone
nodes.description: Our team tried using Vixer video editor on iPhone so you know what to expect before downloading the app. Check it out here!
nodes.coverAlt: Reviewing Vixer Video Editor On iPhone

nodes.title: Reviewing Splice Video Editor on iPhone
nodes.description: Our team tried using Splice video editor on iPhone so you know what to expect before downloading the app. Check it out here!
nodes.coverAlt: Reviewing Splice Video Editor on iPhone

nodes.title: Leaving A Long-Lasting Legacy: Curating Your Family’s History
nodes.description: Join us as we tell the story of Jeff Dormish, who wants to pass on his family history to his children as part of his legacy, and how he inspired the Video Translator team.
nodes.coverAlt: Meninggalkan Warisan Jangka Panjang: Mengurasi Sejarah Keluarga Anda

nodes.title: The 8 Best Short Video Apps for Android 2021
nodes.description: Want to create the next viral short video with your Android phone? Check out these 8 short video apps to help make your dreams come true!
nodes.coverAlt: The 8 Best Short Video Apps for Android 2021

nodes.title: What Does A Video Translation Partnership Look Like?
nodes.description: VideoTranslator is happy to announce a deal with Dandelions, a space/iot company based in Sydney. Why does a space company need video translation?
nodes.coverAlt: What Does A Video Translation Partnership Look Like?

nodes.title: What Is Next For VideoTranslator?
nodes.description: Team VideoTranslator has big things planned for 2021. Read on to find out about what our pipeline looks like?
nodes.coverAlt: What Is Next For VideoTranslator

nodes.title: How Vyasa University Is Fighting Covid With Video Translation
nodes.description: Vyasa University is working to raise awareness about Covid-19. Read more about how they used video translation to reach stakeholders across 8 Indian languages.
nodes.coverAlt: How Vyasa University Is Fighting Covid With Video Translation

nodes.title: How QAChef Is Reaching Clients In A Tough Market
nodes.description: QAChef a tech company in hospitality - is using video translation in Chinese and Arabic to gain new clients in a tough climate using marketing localization and marketing internationalization.
nodes.coverAlt: Bagaimana QAChef Menjangkau Klien Di Pasar yang Sulit

nodes.title: Video Translation And Its Implications For FireTech
nodes.description: Talking to FireTech's Leigh Kelson, we cover the origins of the video translator app, and what video translation can do for clients. We also cover the role of AI and ML in the language space.
nodes.coverAlt: Video Translation And Its Implications For FireTech

nodes.title: How Subtitling Can Boost ROI
nodes.description:
AI internationalization has a important role to play in boosting your
  video ROI or ROAS. What are the options, and how can you optimize your content production
  process to take advantage of this mega-trend?
nodes.coverAlt: AI Internationalization: How Subtitling Can Boost ROI

nodes.title: A Little Positivity: To Brighten Your Day, Week And Month!
nodes.description:
We're focusing on the good news today, throughout all this devastation
  and chaos, there are people helping and trying to make the situation better in any
  way that they can.
nodes.coverAlt: A Little Positivity: To Brighten Your Day, Week And Month!

nodes.title: The Girls and Women Revitalising Canada's Indigenous Languages
nodes.description:
It was International Women's Day this past Sunday 8 March and in honour
  of the day we're looking at some incredible females who are doing all they can for
  their native languages.
nodes.coverAlt: International Women's Day, girls in language

nodes.title: Fighting the Coronavirus and E. Coli with Machine Learning
nodes.description:
When it comes to combating superbugs and viruses, the human raced needs
  all the help it can get. Artificial Intelligence is being implemented to find treatments
  to fight bacteria that was formally resistant to all forms of antibiotics.
nodes.coverAlt: Artificial Intelligence Saving the Humans

nodes.title: How AI Transcription Fails And What To Do About It
nodes.description: the transcription or translation depending upon what you are trying to do. '
nodes.coverAlt: How AI Transcription Fails And What To Do About It: AI Failed Rocketship

nodes.title: How AI Dubbing Will Change Everything: Building A Video Translator
nodes.description:
day we look at two very different approaches to building a video translator,
  first a one shot system including lip syncing. Secondly our own app, and some of
  the design decisions we have taken which are very human centred.
nodes.coverAlt: How AI Dubbing Will Change Everything: Building A Video Translator

nodes.title: One Igbo Woman Trying To Save Her Language
nodes.description:
I remember that we got punished as students for speaking our mother tongue
  which was tagged 'vernacular' at school. That affected the growth of our indigenous
  languages greatly. Read about one woman's journey to save her mother tongue, Igbo
nodes.coverAlt: One Igbo Woman Trying To Save Her Language

nodes.title: How To Reach Gen Z Using AI
nodes.description:
The way younger users consumer video content is evolving and marketers
  need to evolve too. In this post we look at how video content consumption is changing
  and where AI can improve your processes.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Reach Gen Z Using AI

nodes.title: AI & Wildlife Preservation
nodes.description:
If there's one thing most of us can agree on, it's that wildlife preservation
  is important. Using Artificial Intelligence, researchers are fighting the good fight
  against wildlife population decline. And in a surprising twist, AI might just help
  us win this fight.
nodes.coverAlt: Artificial Intelligence Saving the Animals

nodes.title: Clients: Why You Make Me Blush!
nodes.description:
A client picked up some bugs in our application. They helped us find
  the source of the bugs. And then they blew us away with their feedback
nodes.coverAlt: Clients: Why You Make Me Blush!

nodes.title: Speaking In The Mother Tongue: AI Indian Languages
nodes.description:
We recently came across an article with the exciting news that the Indian
  government is planning on making its Internet content available in regional languages
  to remove the language barrier among Indians.
nodes.coverAlt: Speaking In The Mother Tongue: AI Indian Languages

nodes.title: Accessibility: Why It Matters And How To Avoid Being Sued
nodes.description:
A hearing impaired couple is suing a hospital for not providing disability
  friendly facilities. Is this justified? How can you avoid being sued for not meeting
  accessibility requirements?
nodes.coverAlt: Accessibility: Why It Matters And How To Avoid Being Sued

nodes.title: On The Brink Of Extinction: Nearly Dead Languages And The Dedicated Linguists   Bringing Them Back To Life
nodes.coverAlt: On The Brink Of Extinction: Nearly Dead Languages And The Dedicated Linguists   Bringing Them Back To Life

nodes.title: Sign Languages: Their past, present and future
nodes.description:
For something that is used by an estimated 70 million people worldwide,
  sign language is pretty important. Going from the past to the future, Google Translate
  is developing a way to translate sign language into speech!
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 30/01/20

nodes.title: Quick Transcribe: For When You Need To Get Transcription Done Quickly
nodes.description:
We introduce the Quick Transcribe functionality. Here we have taken everything
  we learnt about how clients use our app and put it into a single workflow for fast,
  efficient transcription and translation.
nodes.coverAlt: Quick Transcribe: For When You Need To Get Transcription Done Quickly

nodes.title: One place, many languages
nodes.description:
We're talking language today and how diverse it can be even in the same
  country, or city! Germany is still a country divided when it comes to what a pancake
  should be called - maybe they should be called egg-cakes? Also Mandarin is now Melbourne
  and Sydney's most widely spoken community language.
nodes.coverAlt: One place, many languages

nodes.title: Mr Sh*thole: What To Do When Your AI Misbehaves
nodes.description:
Facebook's AI got in trouble this week for translating Chinese President
  Xi Jinping name as Mr Shithole. How to avoid AI disasters. Also, your co-workers
  are likely to trust a robot boss over a human one according to Oracle, and this
  might be a good thing.
nodes.coverAlt: Mr Sh*thole: What To Do When Your AI Misbehaves

nodes.title: Where are we heading with AI computing in the 2020s? And how human can they   really become?
nodes.description:
We now well and truly know that Artificial Intelligence is here to stay,
  but what will become of it, and us, in the future?
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 21/01/20

nodes.title: Real life Dr Dolittle: We are on our way to talking to the animals and AI   may make happen sooner than you think!
nodes.description:
The real life Dr Dolittle: We are on our way to talking to the animals
  and it may happen sooner than you think!
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 08/01/20

nodes.title: 3x Increase In Transcription Efficiency
nodes.description:
We achieved a 3x increase in our transcription efficiency using AI. Read
  on to find out how we did this, and what we learnt from changing our procedure.
nodes.coverAlt: 3x Increase In Transcription Efficiency

nodes.title: Happy Holidays from VideoTranslator!
nodes.description: Thank you for all your support
nodes.coverAlt: Happy Holidays from VideoTranslator!

nodes.title: For the Love of Language
nodes.description:
The world first pidgin-to-English translation model, Baby Shark is speaking
  Navajo and the amazing benefits of growing up in a bilingual household.
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 17/12/19

nodes.title: Exciting developments for Epilepsy patients, Amazon has added 22 new languages   to Amazon Translate and do children have the ability to speak to reindeer?
nodes.description:
Exciting developments for Epilepsy patients, Amazon has added 22 new
  languages to Amazon Translate and has Microsoft given children the ability to speak
  to reindeer?
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 10/12/19

nodes.title: Changes In The Internationalization And Localization Industry
nodes.description:
Rev.com, an industry leader in the internationalization and localization
  business recently changed its pricing model for transcribers. This change not well
  received inside the industry. What happened, why and how to move forward?
nodes.coverAlt: Changes In The Internationalization And Localization Industry

nodes.title: Hello baby! Machine learning helping to understand placental health, did Shakespeare   have help? And advances in health and medicine thanks to AI.
nodes.description:
Hello baby! Machine learning helping to understand placental health,
  did Shakespeare have help? And advances in health and medicine thanks to AI.
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 26/11/19

nodes.title: Using machine learning for the greater good; advances in medicine, agriculture   and saving lives, is there anything we can't do with the help of artificial intelligence?
nodes.description:
AI to the rescue! Using machine learning for the greater good; advances
  in medicine, agriculture and saving lives, is there anything we can't do with the
  help of artificial intelligence?
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 12/11/19

nodes.title: Foreign signs installed to save lives, when seeing isn't believing, learning   about deepfake videos and content creators coming together to save the planet!
nodes.description:
Foreign signs installed to save lives, when seeing isn't believing; learning
  about deep fake videos, content creators coming together to save the planet and
  hilarious movie translations.
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 05/11/19

nodes.title: Google's latest Pixel 4 app impresses, praise for Nobel Prize winner and a   feel-good video to brighten your week!
nodes.description:
Artificial intelligence is allowing us to travel back to the Europe of
  yesteryear. Plus, adapting AI software to search and rescue, and the need for translators
  in domestic violence cases.
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 29/10/19

nodes.title: Travelling back in time with AI, learning the love of translation and why it   is imperative to get more interpreters in courthouses!
nodes.description:
Artificial intelligence is allowing us to travel back to the europe of
  yesteryear. Plus, adapting AI software to search and rescue, and the need for translators
  in domestic violence cases.
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 22/10/19

nodes.title: Babies teaching us how best to teach AI, glasses made for translation and keeping   an eye on our giant fishy friends with AI!
nodes.description:
They''re the best known learners in the universe, so how can babies
  teach AI to think and learn like they do? Also this week: glasses that translate,
  spotting sharks in the surf with AI and a new space for content creators.
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 15/10/19

nodes.title: The Importance of Open Captions for Deaf and Hard of Hearing People
nodes.description:
It comes as no surprise that for hard of hearing and deaf people, closed
  captions are a necessity for being able to watch TV, films and online videos. This
  is one of the reasons we believe it is so important to include open captions in
  videos.
nodes.coverAlt: The Importance of Open Captions

nodes.title: Translation devices changing the business game, machine learning aiding scientific   research and a world first AI concert!
nodes.description:
The art of translation has been a requirement for over 2000 years. One
  translator shares what she has learnt after being in the business for 20 years.
  How machine learning is aiding scientists in researching plants, AI writers writing
  as well as humans can, and we celebrate as Armenia hosts the first ever AI concert.
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 08/10/19

nodes.title: AI is here to help; translation at the tip of your ears; and Google's ALBERT   is receiving top ranks
nodes.description:
Read on to get up to date on some of the most interesting things coming
  out of the world of Artificial Intelligence. There's also top ranking machine learning
  systems and earbuds that can translate languages as you're hearing them.
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 01/10/19

nodes.title: AI tools are transforming Indian healthcare, growth in the Translations Market   and more
nodes.description:
This week we take a look at how AI tools are helping to transform Indian
  healthcare, machine learning is being used to create new music, plus much more.
nodes.coverAlt: The Weekly Roundup 24 September 2019

nodes.title: 9 of China's Best Short Video Apps
nodes.description:
Short video apps are really hitting the ground running in China. In this
  article we give a basic overview of some of the major short video makers in China
  are and what unique features they have to offer.
nodes.coverAlt: 9 Best Short Video Apps you Need to Know About

nodes.title: On The Brink Of Extinction: Nearly Dead Languages And The Dedicated Linguists   Bringing Them Back To Life
nodes.coverAlt: On The Brink Of Extinction: Nearly Dead Languages And The Dedicated Linguists   Bringing Them Back To Life

nodes.title: Clients: Why You Make Me Blush!
nodes.description:
A client picked up some bugs in our application. They helped us find
  the source of the bugs. And then they blew us away with their feedback
nodes.coverAlt: Clients: Why You Make Me Blush!

nodes.title: Speaking In The Mother Tongue: AI Indian Languages
nodes.description:
We recently came across an article with the exciting news that the Indian
  government is planning on making its Internet content available in regional languages
  to remove the language barrier among Indians.
nodes.coverAlt: Speaking In The Mother Tongue: AI Indian Languages

nodes.title: AI & Wildlife Preservation
nodes.description:
If there's one thing most of us can agree on, it's that wildlife preservation
  is important. Using Artificial Intelligence, researchers are fighting the good fight
  against wildlife population decline. And in a surprising twist, AI might just help
  us win this fight.
nodes.coverAlt: Artificial Intelligence Saving the Animals

nodes.title: How To Reach Gen Z Using AI
nodes.description:
The way younger users consumer video content is evolving and marketers
  need to evolve too. In this post we look at how video content consumption is changing
  and where AI can improve your processes.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Reach Gen Z Using AI

nodes.title: One Igbo Woman Trying To Save Her Language
nodes.description:
I remember that we got punished as students for speaking our mother tongue
  which was tagged 'vernacular' at school. That affected the growth of our indigenous
  languages greatly. Read about one woman's journey to save her mother tongue, Igbo
nodes.coverAlt: One Igbo Woman Trying To Save Her Language

nodes.title: How AI Transcription Fails And What To Do About It
nodes.description: the transcription or translation depending upon what you are trying to do. '
nodes.coverAlt: How AI Transcription Fails And What To Do About It: AI Failed Rocketship

nodes.title: How AI Dubbing Will Change Everything: Building A Video Translator
nodes.description:
day we look at two very different approaches to building a video translator,
  first a one shot system including lip syncing. Secondly our own app, and some of
  the design decisions we have taken which are very human centred.
nodes.coverAlt: How AI Dubbing Will Change Everything: Building A Video Translator

nodes.title: Fighting the Coronavirus and E. Coli with Machine Learning
nodes.description:
When it comes to combating superbugs and viruses, the human raced needs
  all the help it can get. Artificial Intelligence is being implemented to find treatments
  to fight bacteria that was formally resistant to all forms of antibiotics.
nodes.coverAlt: Artificial Intelligence Saving the Humans

nodes.title: The Girls and Women Revitalising Canada's Indigenous Languages
nodes.description:
It was International Women's Day this past Sunday 8 March and in honour
  of the day we're looking at some incredible females who are doing all they can for
  their native languages.
nodes.coverAlt: International Women's Day, girls in language

nodes.title: A Little Positivity: To Brighten Your Day, Week And Month!
nodes.description:
We're focusing on the good news today, throughout all this devastation
  and chaos, there are people helping and trying to make the situation better in any
  way that they can.
nodes.coverAlt: A Little Positivity: To Brighten Your Day, Week And Month!

nodes.title: How Subtitling Can Boost ROI
nodes.description:
AI internationalization has a important role to play in boosting your
  video ROI or ROAS. What are the options, and how can you optimize your content production
  process to take advantage of this mega-trend?
nodes.coverAlt: AI Internationalization: How Subtitling Can Boost ROI

nodes.title: Video Translation And Its Implications For FireTech
nodes.description: Talking to FireTech's Leigh Kelson, we cover the origins of the video translator app, and what video translation can do for clients. We also cover the role of AI and ML in the language space.
nodes.coverAlt: Video Translation And Its Implications For FireTech

nodes.title: How QAChef Is Reaching Clients In A Tough Market
nodes.description: QAChef a tech company in hospitality - is using video translation in Chinese and Arabic to gain new clients in a tough climate using marketing localization and marketing internationalization.
nodes.coverAlt: Bagaimana QAChef Menjangkau Klien Di Pasar yang Sulit

nodes.title: How Vyasa University Is Fighting Covid With Video Translation
nodes.description: Vyasa University is working to raise awareness about Covid-19. Read more about how they used video translation to reach stakeholders across 8 Indian languages.
nodes.coverAlt: How Vyasa University Is Fighting Covid With Video Translation

nodes.title: What Is Next For VideoTranslator?
nodes.description: Team VideoTranslator has big things planned for 2021. Read on to find out about what our pipeline looks like?
nodes.coverAlt: What Is Next For VideoTranslator

nodes.title: What Does A Video Translation Partnership Look Like?
nodes.description: VideoTranslator is happy to announce a deal with Dandelions, a space/iot company based in Sydney. Why does a space company need video translation?
nodes.coverAlt: What Does A Video Translation Partnership Look Like?

nodes.title: The 8 Best Short Video Apps for Android 2021
nodes.description: Want to create the next viral short video with your Android phone? Check out these 8 short video apps to help make your dreams come true!
nodes.coverAlt: The 8 Best Short Video Apps for Android 2021

nodes.title: Leaving A Long-Lasting Legacy: Curating Your Family’s History
nodes.description: Join us as we tell the story of Jeff Dormish, who wants to pass on his family history to his children as part of his legacy, and how he inspired the Video Translator team.
nodes.coverAlt: Meninggalkan Warisan Jangka Panjang: Mengurasi Sejarah Keluarga Anda

nodes.description: Our team tried using Splice video editor on iPhone so you know what to expect before downloading the app. Check it out here!

nodes.description: Our team tried using Vixer video editor on iPhone so you know what to expect before downloading the app. Check it out here!

nodes.description: What are the big need to know's around video transcription, why, how and when. Read more...
nodes.coverAlt: What Enterprises Need To Know About Video Transcription?

nodes.description: What is an AI assurance framework and how to apply it to your projects.

nodes.description: VideoTranslator is now a Microsoft partner under the Microsoft Cloud Partner Program!

nodes.description: Our journey with the Bushfire Commercialisation Fund, the power of positive feedback, and our next steps. #bushfiremitigation #resilience

nodes.title: VideoTranslatorAI Wins Feasibility Study for NSW Small Business Innovation & Research Program
nodes.description: VideoTranslatorAI wins NSW SBIR 2022 feasibility study, focusing on AI for healthcare in CALD communities. We are excited to contribute to a more inclusive healthcare in NSW.

nodes.description: Join VideoTranslatorAI as we showcase cutting-edge tech at the 2024 NSW Commercialisation Showcase, celebrating innovation and collaboration in NSW!
